description: Comprehensive Kafka Monitoring Dashboard with Consumer Lag Analysis - Powered by Kafka Exporter

panels.description: Total number of active brokers in the Kafka cluster
panels.title: ️ Brokers

panels.description: Total number of active consumer groups
panels.title: Consumer Groups

panels.description: Total number of partitions in the cluster
panels.title: Total Partitions

panels.description: Total consumer lag - lower is better!
panels.title: ️ Total Lag

panels.description: Number of under-replicated partitions - should be zero!
panels.title: Under-Replicated

panels.description: List of active brokers with address and ID
panels.title: ️ Broker List

panels.description: List of topics with number of partitions and messages
panels.title: Topics Overview

panels.description: Highest lag by consumer group - critical for monitoring!

targets.expr: topk(10, sum by (group) (kafka_consumer_group_lag{job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", topic=~"$topic", group=~"$consumer_group"}))

panels.title: Top 10 Lag by Consumer Group

targets.expr: topk(10, sum by (topic) (kafka_consumer_group_lag{job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", topic=~"$topic", group=~"$consumer_group"}))

panels.description: Lag per partition for the selected consumer group
panels.title: Lag by Partition (Detail)

panels.description: Complete details of each consumer group including offsets and lag

targets.expr: sum by (group, topic) (kafka_consumer_group_lag{job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", topic=~"$topic", group=~"$consumer_group"})
count by (group, topic) (kafka_consumer_group_lag{job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", topic=~"$topic", group=~"$consumer_group"})

panels.title: Consumer Group Summary

title: Kafka Dashboard Full-Overview
